The ESRS Glossary defines substances of very high concern (SVHCs) as substances ‘that meet the
criteria laid down in Article 57 of Regulation (EC) No 1907/2006 (REACH)’ and that are ‘identified
in accordance with Article 59 (1) of that Regulation’.
